title: Tuna and bean salad
ingredients: ['100g (4 oz) frozen runner beans, thawed', '1 (185g) tin tuna in springwater, drained', '1/2 (400g) tin cannellini beans, drained', '1 red onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
